snippet.title: Border Bots VR - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at gameplay from Border Bots VR in this trailer for the upcoming puzzle simulation game set on a futuristic earth where AI is in control. In Border Bots VR, you begin a new role as a booth operator at an AI travel border. Remember, there are not many jobs left for humans these days. Interact and check over a variety of robots, as they try to get through security. Some of their credentials might not be up to scratch--it's up to you to make sure they get the stamp of approval.

Border Bots VR will be available on PlayStation VR2 and SteamVR on September 28, 2023.
